description: jar with figure of warrior mask in relief and two legs at side to serve as handles; paneled dark red and cream surface with polychrome painting; the warrior carries a trophy head in right hand, a scepter in left; under right elbow, and hanging from belt, are other trophy heads; on the opposite side of the vase a stylized puma with two heads terminating ends of the straight, limbless body; around rim a band of geometric figures deriving from Greek key (?); rounded bottom
title: Jar with figure of warrior mask
